alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Lincoln; Oklahoma; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 01 at 2:04AM CDT until June 01 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LINCOLN...EASTERN OKLAHOMA...NORTHEASTERN CLEVELAND AND NORTHWESTERN POTTAWATOMIE COUNTIES... At 204 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Luther to 4 miles west of Meeker to 4 miles west of Tecumseh, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Eastern Oklahoma City, northeastern Norman, southeastern Edmond, Midwest City, Shawnee, Tecumseh, Choctaw, Harrah, McLoud, Spencer, Jones, Nicoma Park, Pink, Luther, Meeker, Wellston, Johnson, Warwick, Newalla and Stella. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
